snippet.title: OFFICIAL THE DIVISION 2 - YEAR 1 TRAILER
snippet.description:
The Division 2 is an ever-evolving game that we are committed to keep improving upon as we listen to community feedback.

Upgrade to Tom Clancy's The Division®2 - Gold Edition which includes the Year 1 Pass and get up to 3 days early access to the game.
http://thedivisiongame.com/preorder

Open Beta from March 1st to 4th. Prepare for The Division 2!
http://thedivisiongame.com/beta

Tom Clancy’s The Division 2 is an online open-world, action shooter RPG experience.
Out March 15th, 2019 on PC, Xbox One and PS4.

Join us now:
Website: http://thedivisiongame.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TheDivisionUK/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/TheDivisionGame
